name: Fleurist
description:
You're the new florist in town, your job is to grow beautiful flowers and create unique bouquets.

How to play?
Just click stuff with LMB!

But wait, I'm stuck...?
1. Select a seed packet
2. Plant the seeds
3. Make sure the ground is watered
4. Wait for the flowers to grow
5. Cut them
6. Arrange them in a bouquet (max 5)
7. Put the bouquet into gallery
8. Sell it for profit

This game was made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 46 Compo.
